Articles.Content:
Hey all!

Just a quick hello to say that I exist on these forums, and am super excited to be here!

Don't have anything else to add, so I'll cut it short there. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Hi Klevi ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

... I don't have anything else to add either, so I'll cut it sh

Hey klevi and welcome to the forums!

Hope to see you around, all the best.

HEY HEY HEY! It's klevi!

Fat Albert aside, welcome!
